nodes.text: The Royal Alderaan Civil Fleet, known simply as the Alderaan Fleet, was a volunteer defense fleet formed to protect the people of Alderaan during the Separatist Crisis and the ensuing Clone Wars. After the Clone Wars ended, the fleet was disarmed and disbanded when Alderaan committed itself to peace, with its weapons placed on board an Alderaanian War Frigate, its most powerful class of ship, named Another Chance, along with three Thranta-class War Cruisers slave-circuited to protect any vessel transmitting its IFF code.
